books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In the first book of the Cousins O'Dwyer trilogy, Iona Sheehan moves to Ireland to investigate her family's history.
books.name: DARK WITCH

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985; now a movie.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by George R. R. Martin
books.description: After a colossal battle, the Seven Kingdoms face new threats; Book 5 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A DANCE WITH DRAGONS

books.author: by Charlaine Harris
books.description: A coda to the Sookie Stackhouse novels that inspired “True Blood.”
books.name: AFTER DEAD

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Six people with intertwined lives, among them an aspiring Olympic skier who is gravely injured, struggle to surmount challenges.
books.name: WINNERS

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: The bookish Hanna has vowed to get out and start dating. And who better to turn her into a sultry siren than her brother’s best friend, Will, a venture capitalist and unapologetic playboy?
books.name: BEAUTIFUL PLAYER

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: Sarah Pleinsworth can’t forgive Hugh Prentice for the duel he fought three years ago that nearly destroyed her family. But first impressions aren't always reliable.
books.name: THE SUM OF ALL KISSES

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: Mary DiNunzio is now a partner at the all-women Philadelphia law firm of Rosato & Associates.
books.name: ACCUSED

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by Diana Palmer
books.description: The former border agent Dalton Kirk has returned to his Wyoming ranch, eager for a little peace — until Merissa, a local eccentric who can glimpse the future, knocks on his door.
books.name: WYOMING BOLD

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: Fame turns the head of a contestant on a reality TV show. Can he regain what is important in his life?
books.name: FIFTEEN MINUTES
